raw_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-raw@' + storage_account
raw_storage_source_folder = 'sap-load-tables'
raw_storage_source_name = 'vw-sap-hr-email-weekly'
workspace_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-workspace@' + storage_account
workspace_storage_temp_folder = 'sap-load-tables'
workspace_storage_temp_name = 'vw-sap-hr-email-weekly'
standardised_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-standardised@' + storage_account
standardised_storage_delta_folder = 'sap-load-tables'
standardised_storage_delta_table_name = 'vw-sap-hr-email-weekly'
delta_lake_table_key_column = 'Pers_No'
delta_lake_table_name = "sap_hr"
delta_lake_database_name = 'odw_standardised_db'

from pyspark.sql.types import *

raw_storage_folder_path = raw_storage_container   + '/' + raw_storage_source_folder + '/' + raw_storage_source_name
workspace_storage_folder_path = workspace_storage_container + '/' + workspace_storage_temp_folder + '/' + workspace_storage_temp_name

rawsourceDF=spark.read.options(header='True', inferSchema='True', delimiter='|').csv(raw_storage_folder_path)

#Rename Columns with illegal Parquet characters
import re
cols=[re.sub("( |\#|\# |\.|\(|\)|\/)","_",i) for i in rawsourceDF.columns] # replace chars with _
cols=[re.sub("([\_]{2,})","_",i) for i in cols] #replace consecutive _ with one _
cols=[re.sub("(\_)$","",i) for i in cols] #remove trailing _
rawsourceDF=rawsourceDF.toDF(*cols)

rawsourceDF.write.option("header", "true").format('parquet').mode('overwrite').save(workspace_storage_folder_path)
#display(rawsourceDF)

# Get all versions
delta_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, standardised_storage_delta_table_path)
display(delta_table.history())
